mapper.select: SELECT disposal_no AS id, ingredient_stock_no AS ingredientStockNo, user_no AS userNo, disposal_quantity AS disposalQuantity, disposal_cost AS disposalCost, disposal_reason AS disposalReason, disposal_at AS disposalAt, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM disposal_histories WHERE user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY disposal_at DESC
